scenarios.situation: The ground begins to rumble violently. Books are falling off the shelves.
scenarios.narrator_intro: The earth is waking up, and it is angry. You have seconds to act.

choices.response: Wait! Running during the shaking is dangerous. Falling debris is your biggest threat.
Good. You protected your head and neck under the sturdy desk.

scenarios.situation: Rain has been falling for 48 hours. Water is starting to seep under your front door.
scenarios.narrator_intro: The river has broken its banks. The water is rising faster than you expected.

choices.text: Go to the basement to save valuables
choices.response: No! Never go into a basement during a flood. You could become trapped as water fills the room.
Correct. Elevation is your best defense against rising floodwaters.
